article: It was a quiet morning during the war. In a small valley, there was a little wooden building, which was an orphanage that  _  many young children who had lost their  _  in the war. Suddenly, a shell  _  on the top of the orphanage's building. Many children were  _  . One little girl was badly hurt and bleeding. A runner was at once sent to  ask for  medical help. When the doctor arrived, he  _  that the girl's greatest need at the moment was blood. He immediately checked the records in the  _  to find someone who had the same blood type as the girl's. A nurse soon  _  the children that had the same blood type together and asked who would be  _  to donate blood to the girl. The children looked shocked, and no one said a word. Again with  _  eyes, the doctor pleaded .  _  a boy slowly raised his hand. When the doctor injected the needle, the boy began to cry. The doctor tried to  _  him, but in vain. Even when the needle was  _  , the little boy was still crying. After the blood was given to the wounded girl, her  _  got better. Then the doctor came to the boy, "Does it hurt?" "No, but I was afraid of dying." The doctor was  _  ! "Why did you think you would die? "With  _  in his eyes the boy replied, "Because I thought you would take all of my  _  to save her! "The doctor didn't know what to say! Then he asked, "  _  you thought you were going to die, why did you  _  to give her your blood?" With tears streaming down, he said in a  _  voice, "Because she is my friend and I love her." There is no greater love in the world!
